00020 #include "point.h"

00025 
00026 void QuadWalk::costrTri(Point2i &p1, Point2i &p2, Point2i &p3)
00027 {
00028     //The three points are on the same line
00029     if ((int)fabs((float)(p3.x*(p1.y-p2.y)+p3.y*(p2.x-p1.x)+p2.y*p1.x-p1.y*p2.x)/
00030               (float)(hypot(p1.y-p2.y,p2.x-p1.x)) )<3  )   //  3 pixels
00031     {
00032         int bl=p1.x; int tr=p1.x; 
00033         Point2i a=p1;
00034         Point2i b=p1;
00035         if (p2.x<=bl) {bl=p2.x; a=p2;}
00036         if (p2.x>=tr) {tr=p2.x; b=p2;}
00037         if (p3.x<=bl) {bl=p3.x; a=p3;}
00038         if (p3.x>=tr) {tr=p3.x; b=p3;}
00039         if ((p1.x==p2.x) && (p2.x==p3.x)) 
00040         {
00041             int mm=std::min(p1.y,std::min(p2.y,p3.y)); 
00042             int MM=std::max(p1.y,std::max(p2.y,p3.y));
00043             Point2i a(p1.x,mm); 
00044             Point2i b(p1.x,MM);
00045             ptr=new LineWalk(a,b);
00046         } else ptr=new LineWalk(a,b);
00047         triangle=false;
00048         line=true;
00049         return;
00050     }
00051 
00052     //The three points form a triangle
00053     minI=std::min(p1.y,std::min(p2.y,p3.y));
00054     minJ=std::min(p1.x,std::min(p2.x,p3.x));
00055     maxI=std::max(p1.y,std::max(p2.y,p3.y));
00056     maxJ=std::max(p1.x,std::max(p2.x,p3.x));
00057 
00058     a1=(double)(p3.y-p1.y);   //retta per AC
00059     b1=(double)(p3.x-p1.x);
00060     p1x=p1.x; p1y=p1.y;
00061     if (a1<0) {a1=-a1; b1=-b1; p1x=p3.x; p1y=p3.y;}
00062     if ((a1==0) && (b1<0)) {a1=-a1; b1=-b1; p1x=p3.x; p1y=p3.y;}
00063 
00064     a2=(double)(p2.y-p1.y);   //retta per AB
00065     b2=(double)(p2.x-p1.x);
00066     p2x=p1.x; p2y=p1.y;
00067     if (a2<0) {a2=-a2; b2=-b2; p2x=p2.x; p2y=p2.y;}
00068     if ((a2==0) && (b2<0)) {a2=-a2; b2=-b2; p2x=p2.x; p2y=p2.y;}
00069 
00070     a3=(double)(p3.y-p2.y);   //retta per CB
00071     b3=(double)(p3.x-p2.x);
00072     p3x=p2.x; p3y=p2.y;
00073     if (a3<0) {a3=-a3; b3=-b3; p3x=p3.x; p3y=p3.y;}
00074     if ((a3==0) && (b3<0)) {a3=-a3; b3=-b3; p3x=p3.x; p3y=p3.y;}
00075     
00076     rewind();
00077 }
00078 
00079 QuadWalk::QuadWalk(Point2i p1, Point2i p2, Point2i p3, Point2i p4) {
00080 // Canonical raster graphic requires the rule ''a polygon contains its bottom and left border but not its top and right one''
00081     quad=true;
00082     triangle=false;
00083     line=false;
00084     
00085     if ( ((p1.x==p2.x) && (p1.y==p2.y)) ||
00086          ((p1.x==p3.x) && (p1.y==p3.y)) ||
00087          ((p1.x==p4.x) && (p1.y==p4.y)) 
00088          )   {
00089         quad=false;
00090         triangle=true; 
00091         costrTri(p2,p3,p4);
00092         return;
00093         }
00094 
00095     minI=std::min(p1.y,std::min(p2.y,std::min(p3.y,p4.y)));
00096     minJ=std::min(p1.x,std::min(p2.x,std::min(p3.x,p4.x)));
00097     maxI=std::max(p1.y,std::max(p2.y,std::max(p3.y,p4.y)));
00098     maxJ=std::max(p1.x,std::max(p2.x,std::max(p3.x,p4.x)));
00099     
00100     //retrieve the four contour lines
00101     
00102     float AC=hypot(p3.x-p1.x,p3.y-p1.y);
00103 
00104     double a=-1.*(double)(p2.y-p1.y);
00105     double b=(double)(p2.x-p1.x);
00106     double sqroot=hypot(a,b);
00107     double c=((double)(p2.y*p1.x-p1.y*p2.x))/sqroot;
00108     a=a/sqroot; b=b/sqroot;
00109     float h=fabs(a*p3.x+b*p3.y+c);
00110     float ang1=(asin(h/AC))*180./M_PI;  //angolo CAB
00111     if ((b*(p3.x-p1.x)-a*(p3.y-p1.y))<0)
00112     { ang1=180.-ang1; //printf("\nscambio!");
00113     }
00114 
00115     a=-1.*(double)(p4.y-p1.y);
00116     b=(double)(p4.x-p1.x);
00117     sqroot=hypot(a,b);
00118     c=((double)(p4.y*p1.x-p1.y*p4.x))/sqroot;
00119     a=a/sqroot; b=b/sqroot;
00120     h=fabs(a*p3.x+b*p3.y+c);
00121     float ang2=(asin(h/AC))*180./M_PI;     //angolo CAD
00122     if ((b*(p3.x-p1.x)-a*(p3.y-p1.y))<0)
00123     {ang2=180.-ang2; //printf("\nscambio!");
00124     }
00125 
00126     float AB=hypot(p2.x-p1.x,p2.y-p1.y);
00127     h=fabs(a*p2.x+b*p2.y+c);
00128     float ang3=(asin(h/AB))*180./M_PI;     //angolo BAD
00129     if ((b*(p2.x-p1.x)-a*(p2.y-p1.y))<0)
00130     {ang3=180.-ang3; //printf("\nscambio!");
00131     }
00132 
00133     if ((ang2>ang1) && (ang2>ang3))
00134     {
00135         //printf("\nL'angolo CAD e' il maggiore: CAB=%3.1f, CAD=%3.1f, BAD=%3.1f",ang1,ang2,ang3);
00136         a1=(double)(p4.y-p1.y);   //retta per AD
00137         b1=(double)(p4.x-p1.x);
00138         p1x=p1.x; p1y=p1.y;
00139         if (a1<0) {a1=-a1; b1=-b1; p1x=p4.x; p1y=p4.y;}
00140         if ((a1==0) && (b1<0)) {a1=-a1; b1=-b1; p1x=p4.x; p1y=p4.y;}
00141 
00142         a2=(double)(p3.y-p1.y);   //retta per AC
00143         b2=(double)(p3.x-p1.x);
00144         p2x=p1.x; p2y=p1.y;
00145         if (a2<0) {a2=-a2; b2=-b2; p2x=p3.x; p2y=p3.y;}
00146         if ((a2==0) && (b2<0)) {a2=-a2; b2=-b2; p2x=p3.x; p2y=p3.y;}
00147 
00148         a3=(double)(p3.y-p2.y);   //retta per CB
00149         b3=(double)(p3.x-p2.x);
00150         p3x=p2.x; p3y=p2.y;
00151         if (a3<0) {a3=-a3; b3=-b3; p3x=p3.x; p3y=p3.y;}
00152         if ((a3==0) && (b3<0)) {a3=-a3; b3=-b3; p3x=p3.x; p3y=p3.y;}
00153 
00154         a4=(double)(p4.y-p2.y);   //retta per BD
00155         b4=(double)(p4.x-p2.x);
00156         p4x=p2.x; p4y=p2.y;
00157         if (a4<0) {a4=-a4; b4=-b4; p4x=p4.x; p4y=p4.y;}
00158         if ((a4==0) && (b4<0)) {a4=-a4; b4=-b4; p4x=p4.x; p4y=p4.y;}
00159     } else
00160 
00161     if ((ang3>ang2) && (ang3>ang1))
00162     {
00163         //printf("\nL'angolo BAD e' il maggiore: CAB=%3.1f, CAD=%3.1f, BAD=%3.1f",ang1,ang2,ang3);
00164         a1=(double)(p4.y-p1.y);   //retta per AD
00165         b1=(double)(p4.x-p1.x);
00166         p1x=p1.x; p1y=p1.y;
00167         if (a1<0) {a1=-a1; b1=-b1; p1x=p4.x; p1y=p4.y;}
00168         if ((a1==0) && (b1<0)) {a1=-a1; b1=-b1; p1x=p4.x; p1y=p4.y;}
00169 
00170         a2=(double)(p2.y-p1.y);   //retta per AB
00171         b2=(double)(p2.x-p1.x);
00172         p2x=p1.x; p2y=p1.y;
00173         if (a2<0) {a2=-a2; b2=-b2; p2x=p2.x; p2y=p2.y;}
00174         if ((a2==0) && (b2<0)) {a2=-a2; b2=-b2; p2x=p2.x; p2y=p2.y;}
00175 
00176         a3=(double)(p3.y-p4.y);   //retta per CD
00177         b3=(double)(p3.x-p4.x);
00178         p3x=p4.x;p3y=p4.y;
00179         if (a3<0) {a3=-a3; b3=-b3; p3x=p3.x; p3y=p3.y;}
00180         if ((a3==0) && (b3<0)) {a3=-a3; b3=-b3; p3x=p3.x; p3y=p3.y;}
00181 
00182         a4=(double)(p3.y-p2.y);   //retta per BC
00183         b4=(double)(p3.x-p2.x);
00184         p4x=p2.x;p4y=p2.y;
00185         if (a4<0) {a4=-a4; b4=-b4; p4x=p3.x; p4y=p3.y;}
00186         if ((a4==0) && (b4<0)) {a4=-a4; b4=-b4; p4x=p3.x; p4y=p3.y;}
00187     } else
00188 
00189     if ((ang1>ang2) && (ang1>ang3))
00190     {
00191         //printf("\nL'angolo CAB e' il maggiore: CAB=%3.1f, CAD=%3.1f, BAD=%3.1f",ang1,ang2,ang3);
00192         a1=(double)(p2.y-p1.y);   //retta per AB
00193         b1=(double)(p2.x-p1.x);
00194         p1x=p1.x; p1y=p1.y;
00195         if (a1<0) {a1=-a1; b1=-b1; p1x=p2.x; p1y=p2.y;}
00196         if ((a1==0) && (b1<0)) {a1=-a1; b1=-b1; p1x=p2.x; p1y=p2.y;}
00197 
00198         a2=(double)(p3.y-p1.y);   //retta per AC
00199         b2=(double)(p3.x-p1.x);
00200         p2x=p1.x; p2y=p1.y;
00201         if (a2<0) {a2=-a2; b2=-b2; p2x=p3.x; p2y=p3.y;}
00202         if ((a2==0) && (b2<0)) {a2=-a2; b2=-b2; p2x=p3.x; p2y=p3.y;}
00203 
00204         a3=(double)(p3.y-p4.y);   //retta per CD
00205         b3=(double)(p3.x-p4.x);
00206         p3x=p4.x; p3y=p4.y;
00207         if (a3<0) {a3=-a3; b3=-b3; p3x=p3.x; p3y=p3.y;}
00208         if ((a3==0) && (b3<0)) {a3=-a3; b3=-b3; p3x=p3.x; p3y=p3.y;}
00209 
00210         a4=(double)(p4.y-p2.y);   //retta per BD
00211         b4=(double)(p4.x-p2.x);
00212         p4x=p2.x; p4y=p2.y;
00213         if (a4<0) {a4=-a4; b4=-b4; p4x=p4.x; p4y=p4.y;}
00214         if ((a4==0) && (b4<0)) {a4=-a4; b4=-b4; p4x=p4.x; p4y=p4.y;}
00215     }
00216 
00217     else {
00218         quad=false;
00219         triangle=true;
00220         if (ang1==ang2) 
00221         {
00222             if (hypot(p2.x-p1.x,p2.y-p1.y)>hypot(p4.x-p1.x,p4.y-p1.y)) costrTri(p1,p2,p3);
00223             else costrTri(p1,p3,p4);
00224         } else if(ang2==ang3) {
00225         if (hypot(p2.x-p1.x,p2.y-p1.y)>hypot(p3.x-p1.x,p3.y-p1.y)) costrTri(p1,p2,p4);
00226             else costrTri(p1,p3,p4);
00227         } else //ang1==ang3
00228             if (hypot(p3.x-p1.x,p3.y-p1.y)>hypot(p4.x-p1.x,p4.y-p1.y)) costrTri(p1,p2,p3);
00229             else costrTri(p1,p2,p4);
00230         return;
00231     }
00232     //end retrieving the four contour lines
00233         
00234     rewind();
00235 } //costruttore
00236 
00237 bool QuadWalk::appartiene() {
00238     if ( (j>=j1) && (!sup1) && (t1>=0.) && (t1<1.) )
00239     {
00240         conta++;
00241         sup1=true;
00242     }
00243     if ((j>=j2) && (!sup2) && (t2>=0.) && (t2<1.) )
00244     {
00245         conta++;
00246         sup2=true;
00247     }
00248     if ((j>=j3) && (!sup3) && (t3>=0.) && (t3<1.) )
00249     {
00250         conta++;
00251         sup3=true;
00252     }
00253     if ((quad) && (j>=j4) && (!sup4) && (t4>=0.) && (t4<1.) )
00254     {
00255         conta++;
00256         sup4=true;
00257     }
00258     if (conta%2!=0)
00259         return true; else return false;
00260 }
00261 
00262 bool QuadWalk::next() {
00263     if (line) return ptr->next();
00264     while (i<maxI) 
00265     {
00266         while(j<maxJ)
00267         {
00268             j++;
00269             if (appartiene()) return true;
00270         }
00271         i++;
00272         j=minJ-1;
00273         conta=0;
00274         sup1=false;sup2=false;sup3=false;sup4=false;
00275         //j1=(-c1-b1*i)/a1; j2=(-c2-b2*i)/a2; j3=(-c3-b3*i)/a3; j4=(-c4-b4*i)/a4;
00276         t1=(i-p1y)/a1; t2=(i-p2y)/a2; t3=(i-p3y)/a3; 
00277         if (quad) t4=(i-p4y)/a4;
00278         j1=(int)(p1x+b1*t1); j2=(int)(p2x+b2*t2); j3=(int)(p3x+b3*t3); 
00279         if (quad) j4=(int)(p4x+b4*t4);
00280     }
00281     return false;
00282 }
00283 
00284 void QuadWalk::rewind()
00285 {
00286     if (line) {ptr->rewind(); return;}
00287     
00288     i=minI;
00289     j=minJ;
00290     conta=0;
00291     sup1=false;sup2=false;sup3=false;sup4=false;
00292     //j1=(-c1-b1*i)/a1; j2=(-c2-b2*i)/a2; j3=(-c3-b3*i)/a3; j4=(-c4-b4*i)/a4;
00293     t1=(i-p1y)/a1; t2=(i-p2y)/a2; t3=(i-p3y)/a3; 
00294     if (quad) t4=(i-p4y)/a4;
00295     j1=(int)(p1x+b1*t1); j2=(int)(p2x+b2*t2); j3=(int)(p3x+b3*t3); 
00296     if (quad) j4=(int)(p4x+b4*t4);
00297     if (!appartiene()) next();
00298 }
00299 
00300 Point2i QuadWalk::getPoint() const {
00301     if (!line) return Point2i(j, i);
00302     else return ptr->getPoint();
00303 }
